# Block building

This test shows how `b11r` can be used to assemble an unsealed block.


```console
$ go run . b11r --input.header=testdata/20/header.json --input.txsRlp=testdata/20/txs.rlp --input.uncles=testdata/20/uncles.json --output.block=stdout
{
  "rlp": "",
  "hash": "0x263ef16f9d26696f43d6274e3a22947844ab80201fb469cdf5da4451509be234"
}
```
